subject: Add global cell selection with sticky ContextBar and canvas click-to-select
body:
- New ContextBar component: sticky bar with page nav, miniature cell grid, undo/redo
- Global selectedCell state in App.jsx drives which cell tabs operate on
- CanvasCellOverlay: click cells in preview to select them (highlight border)
- Header is no longer sticky (ContextBar replaces it as the persistent UI)
- StyleTab overlay/spacing and ContentTab freeform now use global selectedCell
- Removed local cell selection state from StyleTab and ContentTab
